author: jfthomps
msg: getPossibleRecentFailures in isAvailable can end up removing only available machine

modified isAvailable - if calling getPossibleRecentFailures results in decreasing the number of computers to look at, save the original set, then if allocComputer doesn't allocate anything, try calling it again with the original set of computers
